title: Login as BOC Approver
custom_preconds:
(username/password: test_boc_approver@mlb.com/pass@HEARD)

Given the user has navigated to the test url
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the correct credentials 
AND clicks Log In
custom_expected:
THEN the user will successfully log in 
AND the home dashboard will display

custom_preconds:
(username/password: (Test-SD-admin@mlb.com/western@WEDGE)
Given the user has navigated to the test url
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters the correct credentials 
AND clicks Log In
custom_expected:
THEN the user will successfully log in

title: User can quickly search for Professional Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127328] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user wants to find a professional player through quick search
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects "Professional Player" from quick search dropdown 
AND types in three characters
custom_expected: THEN search results are displayed in dropdown

title: Verify Advanced Search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127328] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user wants to do an advanced search
AND "Search" appears as an option in the left navigation for all users.
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the search button
custom_expected: THEN the advanced search page loads

title: Selects Major Contract- BOC User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127328] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has performed advanced search for a Pro player 
AND BOC user has opened the player's Pro Player Profile from advanced search
AND BOC user navigated to players Contract History Widget
AND BOC user has clicked Create New button on the Contract History Widget
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user selects Major Contract
custom_expected: THEN a preliminary contract for the same player will be launched

title: Selects Major Contract- Club User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127338] has been completed and passed
AND Club user has performed advanced search for a Pro player 
AND Club user has opened the player's Pro Player Profile from advanced search
AND Club user navigated to players Contract History Widget
AND Club user has clicked Create New button on the Contract History Widget
custom_steps: WHEN Club user selects Major Contract
custom_expected: THEN a preliminary contract for the same player will be launched

title: As a user I want to be able to Save and Run Rule Checks on a MJ Contract when the rule(s) doesn't meet
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1045084] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has opened a new, preliminary Major Contract from create new on a Pro Player Profile
AND BOC user doesn't meet the requirement or save/submit rule(s) (eg. blank required field)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on "Save and Run Rule Checks" option on MJ Contracts within the Save split button
custom_expected:
THEN system will run all On Submit and On Save rules for the MJ contract and then save any changes made to the contract.
AND a blocking message will display any errors or warnings found, using the standard styling for errors and warnings. 
AND The title of the blocking message should be Errors detected and the text "Please update and try again" should be removed.
AND The button of the blocking message should be "OK"
AND Clicking OK will take the user back to the MJ Contract in view mode and a successful save notification will be triggered
AND If no errors/warnings are found use a blue notification saying "No errors detected"

title: As a user I want to be able to Save and Run Rule Checks on a MJ Contract that meets all the rules
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1045084] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has opened a new, preliminary Major Contract from create new on a Pro Player Profile
AND BOC user meets all the requirments
AND meets all the on submit or save rules for MJ contracts
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on "Save and Run Rule Checks" option on MJ Contracts within the Save split button
custom_expected:
THEN system will run all On Submit and On Save rules for the MJ contract 
AND a blue notification will display saying "No errors detected" 
AND then save any changes made to the contract.

title: As a user I want approving a contract to stamp the attached contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127380] has completed and passed
And user has attached a file labelled contract to the MJC
custom_steps: WHEN the Contract is moved to an Approved or Approved for next year state
custom_expected:
THEN The system should add an approval stamp to the "Approvals" page of the attached contract. 
The system shouldl need to determine what page of the uploaded pdf the Approvals page is on and stamp in the proper coordinates
The stamp should be same as EBIS1

title: As a user I want to be able to indicate whether a Club is taking out additional insurance on a player - BOC user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127328] has been completed and passed
AND [C1127380] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user is in Insurance information selection of the contract
custom_steps: WHEN user checks off "Life/AD will be purchased outside of MLB's programs"
custom_expected:
THEN an "Additional Insurance Amount" box to display where the Club will be required to enter an amount. (Required only if displayed)
AND no maximum will be enforced on the filed and it should use the same dollar formatting that the rest of the contract uses. 
AND the Printed Life Insurance form that prints as part of the Contract will reflect the addition of the amount by stating the amount that will be provided to the Club, and by reflecting the additional insurance amount in the "maximum" value that is printed on the form (currently it is always 37 million).

title: As a user I want to be able to indicate whether a Club is taking out additional insurance on a player  - Club user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127338] has been completed and passed
AND [C1127684] has been completed and passed
AND Club user is in Insurance information selection of the contract
custom_steps: WHEN user checks off "Life/AD will be purchased outside of MLB's programs"
custom_expected:
THEN an "Additional Insurance Amount" box to display where the Club will be required to enter an amount. (Required only if displayed)
AND no maximum will be enforced on the filed and it should use the same dollar formatting that the rest of the contract uses. 
AND the Printed Life Insurance form that prints as part of the Contract will reflect the addition of the amount by stating the amount that will be provided to the Club, and by reflecting the additional insurance amount in the "maximum" value that is printed on the form (currently it is always 37 million).

title: LRD user adds a custom language for a specific clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127328] has been completed and passed
AND [C1127380] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has added a clause to the individual contract (e.g. Guarantee Provision)
AND BOC user clicked the language dropdown for the clause
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects custom from the dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the WISYWIG editor will appear in the contract form

title: LRD user can select a language for a specific clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127328] has been completed and passed
AND [C1127380] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has added a clause to the individual contract (e.g. Guarantee Provision)
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks the Language dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the dropdown will display the stored Club-entered and stored BOC-entered language options for that specific clause
AND will also display a Custom option 
AND the user can select any of the options displayed 
AND the user cannot have more than one language selected for the specific clause

title: CLUB user can select a language for a specific clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127338] has been completed and passed
AND [C1127684] has been completed and passed
AND Club user has added a clause to the individual contract (e.g. Guarantee Provision)
custom_steps: WHEN the club user clicks the Language dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the dropdown will display the stored logged in Club-entered and stored BOC-entered language options for that specific clause
AND will also display a Custom option 
AND the user can select any of the options displayed 
AND the user cannot have more than one language selected for the specific clause

title: View various stored languages
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127328] has been completed and passed
AND [C1127380] has been completed and passed
AND the user wants to view the stored languages on a contract's clause
AND the contract's clause has a stored language
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the 'view' option for the stored language
custom_expected: THEN the stored language should open in a new window/tab

title: As a user I want to be able to create a Major Contract for a Domestic Amateur player -  BOC User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127328] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has performed advanced search for a Domestic Amateur player 
AND BOC user has opened the player's Domestic Amateur Player Profile from advanced search
AND BOC user has clicked Create New menu on the profile
custom_steps: WHEN user selects Create New -> Contract
custom_expected:
THEN system should enable a secondary dropdown with "Major Contract" as an option
AND selecting "Major Contract" should launch a new, preliminary contract for the player
AND the contract workflow should work the same as for any other free agent, including the autocreation of a Sign Free Agent transaction (see add player to roster rules) and ALL business rules
AND the approval of the Sign Free Agent transaction should trigger the player's amateur profile being converted to a professional player profile
AND when the contract loads, the browser tab info for the Major League Contract should be Maj Cont - Last, Roster First

title: As a user I want to be able to create a Major Contract for a Domestic Amateur player - Club User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127338] has been completed and passed
AND Club user has performed advanced search for a Domestic Amateur player 
AND Club user has opened the player's Domestic Amateur Player Profile from advanced search
AND Club user has clicked Create New menu on the profile
custom_steps: WHEN user selects Create New -> Contract
custom_expected:
THEN system should enable a secondary dropdown with "Major Contract" as an option
AND selecting "Major Contract" should launch a new, preliminary contract for the player
AND when the contract loads, the browser tab info for the Major League Contract should be Maj Cont - Last, Roster First
AND when all the required fields are entered club user can submit the contract to BOC

title: As a user I want to be able to create a Major Contract for an International Amateur player - BOC User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127328] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has performed advanced search for a International Amateur player
AND BOC user has opened the player's International Amateur player Profile from advanced search
AND BOC user has clicked Create New menu on the profile
custom_steps: WHEN selects Create New -> Contract
custom_expected:
THEN system should enable a secondary dropdown with "Major Contract" as an option
AND selecting "Major Contract" should launch a new, preliminary contract for the player 
AND the contract workflow should work the same as for any other free agent, including the autocreation of a Sign Free Agent transaction (see add player to roster rules) and ALL business rules
AND the approval of the Sign Free Agent transaction should trigger the player's amateur profile being converted to a professional player profile
AND when the contract loads, the browser tab info for the Major League Contract should be Maj Cont - Last, Roster First

title: As a user I want to be able to create a Major Contract for an International Amateur player - Club user
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127338] has been completed and passed
AND Club user has performed advanced search for an International Amateur player 
AND Club user has opened the player's International Amateur Player Profile from advanced search
AND Club user has clicked Create New menu on the profile
custom_steps: WHEN selects Create New -> Contract
custom_expected:
THEN system should enable a secondary dropdown with "Major Contract" as an option
AND selecting "Major Contract" should launch a new, preliminary contract for the player 
AND when the contract loads, the browser tab info for the Major League Contract should be Maj Cont - Last, Roster First
AND when all the required fields are entered club user can submit the contract to BOC to be approved

title: As a user I want to be able to delete MJ Contracts in post-preliminary states - BOC User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127328] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has performed advanced search for a MJC in Preliminary, Terms Submitted, Ready for Signature or "Pending Approval" state (not Pending Approval Terms Confirmed)
AND BOC user has opened the MJ contracts
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks edit
custom_expected:
THEN if the contract is in a Preliminary, Terms Submitted, Ready for Signature or "Pending Approval" state (not Pending Approval Terms Confirmed), user should see a "Delete" button
AND clicking "Delete" should prompt the user that they wish to permanently delete the contract (as it works now for Preliminary)
AND if user confirms - the contract should be deleted from the system and a blue successful delete notification should be displayed

title: As a user I want to be able to delete MJ Contracts in post-preliminary states - Club User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127338] has been completed and passed
AND Club user has performed advanced search for a MJC in Preliminary, Terms Submitted, Ready for Signature or "Pending Approval" state (not Pending Approval Terms Confirmed)
AND Club user has opened the MJ contracts
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks edit
custom_expected:
THEN if the contract is in a Preliminary, Terms Submitted, Ready for Signature or "Pending Approval" state (not Pending Approval Terms Confirmed), user should see a "Delete" button
AND clicking "Delete" should prompt the user that they wish to permanently delete the contract (as it works now for Preliminary)
AND if user confirms - the contract should be deleted from the system and a blue successful delete notification should be displayed

title: Update treatment of assignment bonuses
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127328] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has performed Advanced Search for a MJ League Contract Containing an Assignment Bonus
AND Assignment Bonus has been marked "Earned" (Meaning contract was assigned('traded') to another MJ club and Makeable Bonus batch has run and marked the bonus 'earned')
AND BOC user is viewing the MJC
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user navigates to the Payroll Tab of the player's MJC
custom_expected: THEN the earned Assignment Bonus amount should be reflected in the payroll for the Club that assigned the Player's MJC (From Club)

title: Max salary cut rule
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127328] has been completed and passed
AND [C1127380] has been completed and passed
AND BOC doesn't meet max salary cut rule (ex. Enter $100 for major league compensation Base and Guaranteed Salary)
custom_steps: WHEN override message is clicked
custom_expected: THEN flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Signing date more than a month BEFORE current date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127328] has been completed and passed
AND [C1127380] has been completed and passed
AND contract has a signing date a month BEFORE current date
custom_steps: WHEN user move the contract to next state
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Terms Submitted > Ready for Signature
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127328] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has performed advanced search for MJ contract in Term submitted state
AND BOC user has opened the MJ contract from advanced search
AND BOC user sets a Flag on the contract (Ex. Max salary cut rule)
custom_steps:
WHEN user attempts to move contract to Ready for Signature without correcting current flag 
AND clicks override button
custom_expected: THEN flag remains

title: Pending Approval (confirmed or not) > Approved or Approved for next year
custom_preconds:
GIVEN [C1127328] has been completed and passed
AND BOC user has performed advanced search for MJ contract in Pending Approval (confirmed or not) state
AND BOC user has opened the MJ contract from advanced search
AND BOC user sets a Flag on the contract (Ex. Max salary cut rule)
custom_steps: WHEN a user would like to Approve contract for this year or next
custom_expected: THEN flag is removed

AND BOC user goes to the Payroll tab of an approved contract

custom_expected: THEN the changes they made will save successfully

custom_steps: WHEN BOC user navigates to Pending Approvals Widget on the clipboard

AND user is viewing Pending Approvals items in the clipboard
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks Player's Name hyperlink under "Player" column
custom_expected: THEN Player Profile should be opened in the same window

AND an MJC with Comments populated in the General Comments section has been submitted to BOC for approval
AND [C1127447] has completed and passed
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks comments bubble in the pending approvals widget for MJC submitted with comments
custom_expected: THEN comments should display in a popover

title: BOC user can view flags

AND [C1127447] has completed and passed
AND BOC is viewing Terms Submitted, Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed), and Pending Approval MJCs in the Pending Approvals Widget
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user clicks on "Type" from Approvals widget
custom_expected: THEN contract should be opened in either view or edit mode

title: As a BOC admin I want to run the MJ Award Bonus Batch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user has executed [C1045084]
AND "MJC Award Bonus Batch" is a batch option under the "Major Contracts" section on the batch screen
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "MJC Award Bonus Batch"
custom_expected:
THEN system should open the batch in the batch screen 
AND the batch parameters should display per the batch requirements
AND a "Run" button should be available
AND clicking "Run" should run the batch according to the selected parameters
AND when the batch is run system should: 
- Get Contracts with Award Bonus Terms, Salary Escalators and Conditional Options that are currently in an Approved, Update Approved, Expired or Approved for Next Year status that contain a contract with an Award Bonus or criteria that is not yet marked official
- Iterate over contacts containing awards
- Process Award 
- Check for bonus terms and place finished values
- Update salaries/earned amounts as necessary
- Calculate Vesting Options
- Calculate LRD Present Values
- Calculate Earn Assignment Bonuses
- Calculate Bonus Maximums
- Calculate LRD Salary
- Calculate Total Guaranteed 
- Set offered and earned bonus amounts
- Save contract
AND results should only include players who had a contract updated by the batch and should display in the "Batch Results" widget
AND available columns should be Player ID, Player's Name, Org, Club, and Roster Status
AND batch run information should display in the batch history widget

title: As a BOC admin I want to running the MJ Award Bonus Batch to generate notifications
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user has executed [C1045084]
AND BOC user is in the process of executing [C1127548]
custom_steps: WHEN user runs the batch in Update Mode
custom_expected:
THEN a notification should be generated for any clause that is updated
AND if an award bonus is marked earned, Notification "<Player> earned award bonus: <Bonus Earned> <Place Finished>" should be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with
AND if a salary escalator with an award criteria is marked earned, Notification "	
<Player> has earned salary escalator: <Bonus Earned> <Place Finished>" should be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with 
AND if an Option with an award criteria is marked earned, Notification "<Player> has earned the Conditional Option: <Award Earned> <Place Finished>" should be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with

title: BOC admin view MJ Contract Statistics batch screen
